channel.title: Project Clean Up AllStar
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I am sure most of you know how messy and unstable Allstar is as a source, and I have decided to clean it up and give it an economy, and skills that work properly, and don't just poop out money all the time.
Fix Skills Thieving - 80% - Just need pick pocketing. Woodcutting - 20% - Cuts logs way too fast, models are broken. Fix Combat Re-write drop system Lower XP rates Update shops Make real Slayer
That's just what I'm working on now, will update later and list what I have fixed.
Fixed List: I have fixed thieving auto clicking by making it so that all but 3 stalls don't give stackable items. Also, it gives a low XP rate and has a fair clicking delay. [IMG]http://i818.photobucket.com/albums/zz104/KrazyKarl5/Server%20Dev/ThievingAutoFix.jpg[/img]

[/quote]What he said. Silab was the best

Silab wasn’t a server. O_o[/quote]

He never said it was, the era of items from Silabsoft rocked.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Clean Up AllStar
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Hey everyone, I am sure most of you know how messy and unstable Allstar is as a source, and I have decided to clean it up and give it an economy, and skills that work properly, and don’t just poop out money all the time.

Fix Skills
Thieving - 80% - Just need pick pocketing.
Woodcutting - 20% - Cuts logs way too fast, models are broken.
Fix Combat
Re-write drop system
Lower XP rates
Update shops
Make real Slayer

That’s just what I’m working on now, will update later and list what I have fixed.

Fixed List:
I have fixed thieving auto clicking by making it so that all but 3 stalls don’t give stackable items. Also, it gives a low XP rate and has a fair clicking delay.

ThievingAutoFix.jpg742×490

Read full topic
